2015 Mainstage Auditions

Apple Hill Playhouse will be holding auditions for the 6 show mainstage season on Saturday, March 7 from 10 am - 3 pm.

Please note that this is not Easter Saturday.

We will be auditioning for one musical, The World Goes Round (Kander & Ebb) and 5 plays which will include Butterflies are Free (Leonard Gershe) and Chasing Manet (Tina Howe).

The audition request form will be online beginning February 1. If you will be unable to attend, but would like to be considered for the season, there will be an option to attach a resume and video link beginning February 1.
